required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of Single-use Precision Filtered Infusion Sets for Intravenous Infusion
clinical_study.official_title: Open, Randomized, Parallel Controlled Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Single-use Precision Filtered Infusion Sets for Intravenous Infusion

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a pre-market clinical trial of a single-use precision filter infusion set for pumps, to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of a single-use precision filter infusion set for pumps after being used in humans, and to provide clinical evidence for the official application of the product in China

detailed_description.textblock: This experiment compares the single-use precision filter infusion set produced by Shandong Xinhua Ande Medical Products Co., Ltd. for the same intended use that has been approved to market, and compares the performance of the two products in clinical use, the overall pass rate, and the occurrence of phlebitis Rates and adverse events are used to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of single-use precision filtration infusion sets for pumps.

primary_outcome.description: changes in breathing, resting heart rate, blood pressure, body temperature, etc
changes in breathing, resting heart rate, blood pressure, body temperature, etc
The incidence of adverse events and complications
The incidence of adverse events and complications
Heat source reactions caused by the application of extension tubes, such as nausea, vomiting, chills, fever, etc., are key safety indicators
Heat source reactions caused by the application of extension tubes, such as nausea, vomiting, chills, fever, etc., are key safety indicators

intervention.description: single-use precision filter infusion set (Dalian JMS Medical Apparatus Co., Ltd.)

intervention.intervention_name: single-use precision filter infusion set with needle
intervention.description: single-use precision filter infusion set with needle (Shandong Zhongbao Kang Medical Apparatus Co., Ltd.)
